title: What are some examples of a universal truth sentence? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can give an example of my life experience In India we say “One’s shadow never leaves him/her ,it accompanies the person always'Also “One's shadow is never real and true”The Belief system is “ We spend our life and thoughts on things that are ‘not true and unreal' like shadows. Still such thoughts and Living follow us like 'shadows'” Our ‘living' is purpose full when we minimise our drifting thoughts and divergent living approach. —————————————- Another UNIVERSAL TRUTH which many of us MISSED TO realize initially and regrets for failing to realize as we progress in our physical age . ‘The purpose of life need not be different from the purpose of living “ Initially we tend to confuse our self LIFE AND LIVING and call ‘LIVING IS LIFE’ LIFE IS ALWAYS CONSTANT WE TAKE LIVING AS LIFE and GO THROUGH MISERIES SIMILAR TO SHADOWS ( Also spend our like “ A Blind man, in a dark room looking for a Black cat which is not there’’ Life is always pleasant Miseries as Black cat and we always in search of the same in day to day living.) MISSERIES WILL NEVER LEAVE US AS LONG WE ARE IN THIS UNIVERSE BUT IF ONE DEFINES PURPOSE OF LIVING AND ALLIGN THE LIVING WITH THE LIFE PURPOSE - SHADOWS REMAINS BUT WE NEVER GET INFLUENCED. THE UNIVERSAL TRUTH IS ‘ WE DO NOT RELAISE THIS”

Good answers. One I haven’t seen yet is a Tautology. This is a statement that is true by the meaning of the statement parts itself, no matter what else. Either this keyboard is all blue, or it is not all blue.Either x = y or x <> y. [Gotta learn that math method!][Searching for one that doesn’t use ‘or’.] A = A. (No matter what value A has, A is equal to it.)
